items.sentence: Do you really believe that doing that is absolutely necessary?
I think it's highly unlikely Tom will get custody of the kids.
The reason Tom arrived late was because of a traffic accident.
This is the first time that I've eaten this kind of ice cream.
There are many good reasons why you two shouldn't get married.
I tried to volunteer to do that, but they didn't want my help.
You have a French test tomorrow, so you need to study tonight.
Part of a teacher's job is to prepare students for the future.
One of my duties is to clean all the toilets in this building.
The problem is that that boy never does what he is told to do.
